dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Absurd. Can't believe I'm relegated to B.S.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Focus on your morning lessons... And don't bother me.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: Lunch...? I.D.C. Being out here at this time is a hassle all on its own.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: Nighttime, is it... The train will be arriving soon. Finally, something fun.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: "Just a cleanup job"...? Ha, this is no mere cleaning. This is a form of art.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: Every time I walk through these train doors, vastly different styles of art greet me. This is an opportunity to observe a singular, isolated artistic history that has been molded and honed over thousands of years. Simply electrifying, isn't it?

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: I should be deployed on a clean-up job, not coddling new hires... Hey, you. Make a complaint to the upper management or something.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: Some... Unrefined pieces of art can shamble or even run. Usually a case of multiple passengers being melded into a single body. I must say, that alone is a beautiful sight... It's a shame that they all eventually have to be pulled apart.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
My favorite part of this job...? Sure, listen close. It's the fact that, when they took this train of their own volition, every single one of these works of art didn't know what they were signing up for.
Well, maybe it's that they didn't even care to know. Exquisite irony, isn't it?

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Hmmm... I'm growing restless. When the hell can we get to work?

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Hmph. So you acknowledge my abilities. Then assign me to proper fieldwork, not babysitting.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Finally, fieldwork.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: It's time to clean up.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Get out of my way. I'm... in the zone.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Witness my work.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Nearing completion already...

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Ha.

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: The finishing touches.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Hah, this is also... quite avant—garde...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: N.P.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: S.H.I.T.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: That was serviceable. Now, to wait for the next train.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: That was quite the exhibition. Perhaps I should thank them for being such a delightful collection of arts?

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Dreadful. ...No. I suppose a demotion to L2 would net me more fieldwork.
